antis: she's a bitch who makes others do her job for her!
dany: *attacks her enemies*
antis:...
body:
dany: *follows Tyrion’s advice*

antis: she’s a bitch who makes others do her job for her!

dany: *attacks her enemies*

antis: she’s a self-centered bitch who doesn’t listen to anyone! she’ll become like her father!

summary: tw: rape & everything involved with it: stop talking about what you don’t know (GOT & sansa stark’s rape)
title: tw: rape & everything involved with it: stop talking about what you don’t know (GOT & sansa stark’s rape)
body:
can GOT fandom stop talking about how frigid Sansa Stark will be when she’ll have sex with whoever because she’s been raped… it’s wrong on so many levels that you have no fucking idea of what the fuck you’re saying. victims don’t react all in the same way it CHANGES from person to person due to the circumstances. can you guys STOP MAKING ASSUMPTIONS by showing your insensitivity and ignorance about something very delicate like for real. ship her with whoever you want idc, but don’t make assumptions about something you know nothing about. if you wanna do it, at least do some researches. 

I don’t fucking care if sansa will end up having sex with jon I DON’T WANT TO SEE things like “Sansa WON’T BE ABLE TO PLEASURE Jon BECAUSE SHE’S FRIGID SINCE SHE WAS RAPED” AND BLAH BLAH BLAH s h u t u p.

1. how old you were when you were raped/molested/literally anything sexual that you aren’t doing willingly that might cause you a trauma (usually the younger you are the worse it is; but sexual abuse stays sexual abuse age doesn’t matter, it’s still a fucking gigantic trauma to deal with)

2. WHO DID IT TO YOU (if it’s a close relative like a mother or a father or a brother or a sister then it’s the end of the world for you) 
*the fact that the person who did THIS to you MIGHT LIVE WITH YOU IN YOUR SAME HOUSE, some of us STILL live with their rapists bc they’re still part of our families and no one fucking knows it.

3. WHAT exactly that person or persons did to you and how far it went

4. how many times it happened, and if it repeats itself over and over again

5. what kind of relationship you had with person who did THIS to you (i guess you don’t need my explanation here ugh)

6. if you can bring yourself to go to therapy in order to start a healing process (…i won’t talk in details about this bc i’ll just cry i’m almost 28 and i still can’t do that. i’m on therapy but i don’t talk about it )

7. if you aren’t anymore the owner of your body!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! and you don’t feel your body like it belongs to you anymore. and THIS is a fucking important point, because when other people molestated me i DIDN’T have the will to push them away because my body wasn’t fucking mine ANYMORE. 

8. a lot more to say but if i add something more i’ll just break down so yeah 

9. some of us become hypersexual so your point about every survivor becoming frigid is even more ignorant; the way in which we react to trauma inflicted to us is none of your business it’s ours & our therapists (psychiatrists, psychologists, etc) matter 

10. I’ll stop here because i can’t list anything else i’m sorry it breaks me

it’s more complex than that, especially when these awful inhuman sexual abuses are done to you when you are little girl / little boy*…. they might destroy you forever. fucking do me a favor and shut the fuck up about sansa stark & her “being frigid” shut. the. fuck. up.

* yes little boys too stop forgetting about all the men/boys/little boys being sexually abused just because they’re males. they just don’t fucking talk about it because society will make fun of them & don’t believe them bc society fuckings sucks

PS: i’m angry as fuck and english isn’t my first language so yeah you might find lots of mistakes in here but idc i’m done with ALL of you

blog.title: 竜との舞踏 Dance with Dragons
blog.description: Falcon / 24 / ♀ / HK / Snk blog / East Sea Clan and Ackerman stuff / Eek

summary: speaking of sigils and houses and mottos and just making even more got references in snk: how about “azumabito always pays their...
question: speaking of sigils and houses and mottos and just making even more got references in snk: how about “azumabito always pays their debts” as saying and “Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken” as for motto? I would also say that “not today” from “what do we say to the god of death? not today” but I feel like it’s more for Ackerman clan than azumabito clan
answer:
Nice suggestions Anon~

Currently I have a list of house mottos from George R.R. Martin’s A Song of Ice and Fire which may represent the Azumabito family:

“Fire and Blood” (House Targaryen): Three-headed dragons and three samurai swords parallels. East. Dragons.

“We Do Not Sow” (House Greyjoy): I don’t know if Azumabitos were originally from samurai family but they seized power by force in Hizuru ruling the country, slowly becoming powerful due to their samurai (warrior) nature which might parallel with House Greyjoy and the Ironborn culture, but it is fun to make some hypotheses.

“Family, Duty, Honor” (House Tully): Well it is obvious.

“As High As Honor” (House Arryn): Similar to House Tully’s one. It is said that samurais in old Japan emphasize their honor even more than their own lives.

My list may change later due to the progress of the manga, though.

Thank you for your ask~!

tags: A Song of Ice and Fire
summary: Why Game of Thrones fans get so defensive with their faves, even making comparisons between different characters just to prove...
body:
Why Game of Thrones fans get so defensive with their faves, even making comparisons between different characters just to prove the innocence of their favorite ones? Almost all of characters say or do something that is wrong at least once in their storylines, even if there are many levels of what you can consider wrong which means that we must use a critical thinking about it. 

There are just few characters that are innocents in the most absolute e perfect personification of the term. Shireen, Hodor, etc. 

Embrace your favorite character for what they really are, with all of their shades.

blog.name: outoftunemelody
blog.title: Fiction consumes me and reality is a distant dream
blog.description: torturing myself with the wait of GOT season 8

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: Jonerys is not even a favourite GOT ship of mine and it wouldn't really bother me if Jonerys didn't somehow work out in season...
body:
Jonerys is not even a favourite GOT ship of mine and it wouldn’t really bother me if Jonerys didn’t somehow work out in season 8. However I think it does bother me that a certain group of people feel the need to antagonize and scrape the bottom of the barrel in twisting a character all because she stands in the way of their ship. You never see Jonerys or Gendrya stans so passionately spew hate/write biased metas about another character because it threatens their ship. If a ship heavily relies on you butchering another character and holding her to a double standard compared to everyone else then you’re building on quicksand. Especially when some of said ship shout “sexism” and “misogyny” in defence.

It’s sexism and misogyny to antagonize another female character solely because she is in the way of your fav getting to bang someone.

summary: Lets Talk - Popular TV Shows You Haven't Watched
title: Lets Talk - Popular TV Shows You Haven't Watched
body:
Lets Talk – Popular TV Shows You Haven’t Watched

In the world of TV shows, there are too many of them to keep up with, and it is not possible to watch them all, no matter how long you live on this earth. However, there are some very popular shows that it is almost a sin to say you don’t watch, or have never watched a single episode of.

Finishing the third part of our TV Shows trilogy, Miwan and his guests confess the popular TV Shows that they…

blog.name: watch-write-read-repeat
blog.title: Watcha lookin' at?
blog.description: I (shit)post about movies, series and all kinds of stuff I'm reading here. Might liveblog from time to time. Talk back? ;)

title: Unpopular opinion?
body:
I don’t know about you guys, but I’m kinda over Game of Thrones.
Maybe it’s the long wait for the last installment of the series (I bingewatched the first 5 seasons) but it’s also that the previous season felt underwhelming to me. I still lowkey like many of the characters and the production design is gorgeous but the story just doesn’t get me excited or invested any more.

Might still bingewatch the last season at one point tho xD just fior the sense of closure. Although I don’t know if I can remain in ignorant bliss if some other poeple are losing their shit about it on the internet and irl.

blog.title: A Simple Drunk Tribble
blog.description: Kim/she & Her/Aging like stinky cheese//Lover of Star Wars, Star Trek, and actual stars. Follow me for some really choice gif sets. Role Models: Buffy Summers, Veronica Mars, Femshep, Ellen Ripley,Liz Lemon, Leslie Knope, Captain Kathryn Janeway, Rey, Princess Leia, and the list is ever growing. I should add that I love MBMBAM and TAZ

tags: at least Trump wouldn’t have won
throw in a game of thrones reference
this is how my government structure is in a fantasy land of mine
sometimes i wish we could go back to certain medieval ways
body:
Presidential Tournament

Can we all just imagine what our government would be like if every four years the presidential candidates participated in a tournament. Like, they would state what they wanted to do, then all parties fought within each other to select the champion of their parties; then the champion of each party would fight against the other parties’ champion, (hey, maybe an independent night beat a democrat; and then slaughter the republican) until it was the final two parties. All of America would watch in anticipation as the fight went on until first blood or someone yielded, and then whoever won would raise their weapons in the air. Some to cheers and some to boos. But they won. And for four years, they sit on the iron throne, and govern with honor, and then the have to fight again for their position.
